event.description: Michael Brantley doubles (1) on a fly ball to right fielder Jay Bruce.
Asdrubal Cabrera reaches on fielding error by second baseman Brandon Phillips. Michael Brantley to 3rd.
Shin-Soo Choo strikes out swinging.
Carlos Santana out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Ryan Ludwick. Michael Brantley scores. Asdrubal Cabrera to 2nd.
Travis Hafner hit by pitch.
Casey Kotchman singles on a ground ball to right fielder Jay Bruce. Asdrubal Cabrera out at home on the throw, right fielder Jay Bruce to catcher Devin Mesoraco.
Jason Kipnis singles on a line drive to center fielder Drew Stubbs.
Ryan Spilborghs out on a sacrifice bunt, catcher Devin Mesoraco to first baseman Joey Votto. Jason Kipnis to 2nd.
Lonnie Chisenhall singles on a fly ball to right fielder Jay Bruce. Jason Kipnis scores.
Michael Brantley flies out to center fielder Drew Stubbs.
Asdrubal Cabrera flies out to center fielder Drew Stubbs.
Pitcher Change: Ron Mahay replaces Mike Leake.
Shin-Soo Choo grounds out, second baseman Brandon Phillips to first baseman Joey Votto.
Carlos Santana singles on a line drive to center fielder Drew Stubbs.
Travis Hafner singles on a ground ball to right fielder Jay Bruce. Carlos Santana to 2nd.
Casey Kotchman doubles (1) on a line drive to center fielder Drew Stubbs. Carlos Santana scores. Travis Hafner to 3rd.
Jason Kipnis out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Drew Stubbs. Travis Hafner scores.
Ryan Spilborghs flies out to right fielder Jay Bruce.
Pitcher Change: Nick Masset replaces Ron Mahay.
Lonnie Chisenhall pops out to second baseman Brandon Phillips.
Michael Brantley singles on a ground ball to center fielder Drew Stubbs.
With Asdrubal Cabrera batting, Michael Brantley advances to 2nd on a balk.
Asdrubal Cabrera grounds out, second baseman Brandon Phillips to first baseman Joey Votto. Michael Brantley to 3rd.
Shin-Soo Choo strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: Wilson Valdez replaces second baseman Brandon Phillips, batting 1st, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Paul Janish replaces shortstop Zack Cozart, batting 2nd, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Neftali Soto replaces first baseman Joey Votto, batting 3rd, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Chris Heisey replaces left fielder Ryan Ludwick, batting 4th, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Donald Lutz replaces right fielder Jay Bruce, batting 5th, playing right field.
Willie Harris remains in the game as the third baseman.
Defensive Substitution: Denis Phipps replaces center fielder Drew Stubbs, batting 7th, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Corky Miller replaces catcher Devin Mesoraco, batting 8th, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Logan Ondrusek replaces Nick Masset.
Carlos Santana flies out to center fielder Denis Phipps.
Travis Hafner strikes out swinging.
Casey Kotchman grounds out to first baseman Neftali Soto.
Pitcher Change: Jose Arredondo replaces Logan Ondrusek.
Cord Phelps called out on strikes.
Fred Lewis called out on strikes.
Jose Lopez doubles (1) on a fly ball to left fielder Chris Heisey.
Felix Pie flies out to left fielder Chris Heisey.
Pitcher Change: Jordan Smith replaces Jose Arredondo.
Juan Diaz grounds out, shortstop Paul Janish to first baseman Neftali Soto.
Thomas Neal strikes out swinging.
Luke Carlin singles on a fly ball to left fielder Chris Heisey. Luke Carlin out at 2nd, left fielder Chris Heisey to second baseman Wilson Valdez.
Defensive Substitution: Tucker Barnhart replaces catcher Corky Miller, batting 8th, playing catcher.
Todd Frazier remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Clay Zavada replaces Jordan Smith.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Shelley Duncan replaces Travis Hafner.
Shelley Duncan flies out to center fielder Denis Phipps.
Matt LaPorta grounds out, first baseman Neftali Soto to pitcher Clay Zavada.
Cord Phelps grounds out, second baseman Wilson Valdez to first baseman Neftali Soto.
Pitcher Change: Kanekoa Texeira replaces Clay Zavada.
Fred Lewis walks.
Jose Lopez singles on a ground ball to right fielder Donald Lutz. Fred Lewis to 2nd.
Felix Pie grounds out to first baseman Neftali Soto. Fred Lewis to 3rd. Jose Lopez to 2nd.
Juan Diaz singles on a pop up to shortstop Paul Janish. Fred Lewis scores. Jose Lopez to 3rd.
Thomas Neal reaches on fielding error by shortstop Paul Janish. Jose Lopez scores. Juan Diaz to 2nd.
Luke Carlin grounds into double play, shortstop Paul Janish to second baseman Wilson Valdez to first baseman Neftali Soto. Thomas Neal out at 2nd.
Brandon Phillips doubles (1) on a fly ball to left fielder Ryan Spilborghs.
Zack Cozart called out on strikes.
Joey Votto lines into double play, third baseman Lonnie Chisenhall to second baseman Jason Kipnis. Brandon Phillips doubled off 2nd.
Ryan Ludwick lines out to second baseman Jason Kipnis.
Jay Bruce flies out to left fielder Ryan Spilborghs.
Scott Rolen singles on a fly ball to center fielder Michael Brantley, deflected by left fielder Ryan Spilborghs.
Drew Stubbs singles on a line drive to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo. Scott Rolen to 2nd.
Devin Mesoraco flies out to center fielder Michael Brantley.
Pitcher Change: Vinnie Pestano replaces David Huff.
Dioner Navarro grounds out, third baseman Lonnie Chisenhall to first baseman Casey Kotchman.
Brandon Phillips strikes out swinging.
Zack Cozart flies out to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo.
Pitcher Change: Frank Herrmann replaces Vinnie Pestano.
Joey Votto doubles (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Michael Brantley.
Ryan Ludwick flies out to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo. Joey Votto to 3rd.
Jay Bruce singles on a ground ball to second baseman Jason Kipnis. Joey Votto scores.
Scott Rolen singles on a fly ball to center fielder Michael Brantley. Jay Bruce to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Willie Harris replaces Scott Rolen.
Drew Stubbs doubles (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Michael Brantley. Jay Bruce scores. Willie Harris scores.

Devin Mesoraco singles on a ground ball to left fielder Ryan Spilborghs. Drew Stubbs scores. Devin Mesoraco out at 2nd on the throw, left fielder Ryan Spilborghs to catcher Carlos Santana to second baseman Jason Kipnis.
Dioner Navarro called out on strikes.
Defensive Substitution: Felix Pie replaces center fielder Michael Brantley, batting 1st, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Juan Diaz replaces shortstop Asdrubal Cabrera, batting 2nd, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Thomas Neal replaces right fielder Shin-Soo Choo, batting 3rd, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Matt LaPorta replaces first baseman Casey Kotchman, batting 6th, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Cord Phelps replaces second baseman Jason Kipnis, batting 7th, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Fred Lewis replaces left fielder Ryan Spilborghs, batting 8th, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Jose Lopez replaces third baseman Lonnie Chisenhall, batting 9th, playing third base.
Pitcher Change: Robinson Tejeda replaces Frank Herrmann.
Defensive Substitution: Luke Carlin replaces catcher Carlos Santana, batting 4th, playing catcher.
Wilson Valdez flies out to center fielder Felix Pie.
Paul Janish flies out to center fielder Felix Pie.
Neftali Soto homers (1) on a fly ball to right field.
Chris Heisey reaches on fielding error by third baseman Jose Lopez.
With Donald Lutz batting, Chris Heisey steals (1) 2nd base.
Donald Lutz flies out to center fielder Felix Pie.
Pitcher Change: Jeremy Accardo replaces Robinson Tejeda.
Willie Harris grounds out to first baseman Matt LaPorta.
Denis Phipps grounds out, second baseman Cord Phelps to first baseman Matt LaPorta.
Corky Miller grounds out, shortstop Juan Diaz to first baseman Matt LaPorta.
Pitcher Change: Nick Hagadone replaces Jeremy Accardo.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Todd Frazier replaces Dioner Navarro.
Todd Frazier grounds out, third baseman Jose Lopez to first baseman Matt LaPorta.
Wilson Valdez bunt grounds out, second baseman Cord Phelps to first baseman Matt LaPorta.
Paul Janish singles on a fly ball to right fielder Thomas Neal.
Neftali Soto flies out to right fielder Thomas Neal.
Shelley Duncan remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Corey Kluber replaces Nick Hagadone.
Chris Heisey strikes out swinging.
Donald Lutz doubles (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Felix Pie.
Willie Harris flies out to center fielder Felix Pie.
Denis Phipps grounds out, third baseman Jose Lopez to first baseman Matt LaPorta.
Pitcher Change: Chen Lee replaces Corey Kluber.
Tucker Barnhart grounds out, second baseman Cord Phelps to first baseman Matt LaPorta.
Todd Frazier homers (1) on a fly ball to center field.
Wilson Valdez called out on strikes.
Paul Janish called out on strikes.
